item.title: Eldritch Academia
item.description: Object: Some News Hey Sonia, How are you doing? To answer your question (sorry for the late email, moving did not leave me much time to write), the math department is paying me to study KTu-L spaces. You might have seen some reference to them popping up in the past year, they have gained a lot of visibility as some mathematicians (mostly Providenceâ€™s research team which I will be joining this week) claim that they can be used to solve a number of interesting conjectures.
